label: Example
title: Show that the vector field \(\fb:\Real^2\to\Real^2\) with \(\displaystyle \fb(x,y)=\begin{pmatrix}x-y\\ x+2y\end{pmatrix}\) is differentiable at \(\xb=(2,1)\).

label: Example
title: Find the derivative matrix for the function in Example 1.1.

label: Example
title: Find the derivative matrix at \((0,0)\) for the scalar field \(f:\Real^2\to\Real\) with \(\displaystyle f(x,y)=x^2y.\)
